__e: I've not only maintained your little deception... but I've been a steady partner, putting my hide on the line with yours, going on for three years.
I am better practiced in the art of deception and, no offense, none of you are good actors.
I was queen of deception, and I was on fire.
You know, Chuck, even in the spy world where everything is run by deceit, you still manage to somehow genuinely trust people.
What if you try to cheat on me?
I still cannot tell whether this is acting.
